Nov. 24, 1934 D Wadhurst Contest (Section 2)
Wadhurst Contest (Section 2) 20 March & Hymn Contest Wadhurst Contest wadhurst-contest-section-2
None
Test Piece Contest
The Pirates of Penzance (selection)
Wadhurst, Sussex 4 bands competed Hymn (Sunset): 1. Strood, 2. Wadhurst, 3. West Chiltington. Best cornet and euphonium - Strood.
June 9, 2014, 5:59 p.m. Dec. 28, 2016, 11:20 a.m.
1 City of Rochester Brass A. Weller
2 Wadhurst Brass Band John Martin
3 West Chiltington Silver Band C. M. Chatfield
4 East Grinstead Town Charles Baker
